PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CommunicationsApplianceTypeTelephonyExchange
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to a telephony exchange. This property set is applied to a type or occurrence of IfcCommunicationsAppliance with predefined type TELEPHONYEXCHANGE.

PropertyDef.Name: UserCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the user capacity of the device, defined as the maximum number of users that can be active at the same time.
